posts.post_content: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug  Hall of Famers for sale===SGC 50  John Ward (2nd Base) $3200---SGC 50 Amos Russie $3500--SGC 40 Kid Nichols $2400---SGC 40 John Clarkson $1500---SGC 40 Tommy McCarthy $1400--SGC 30 Billy Hamilton $1100---SGC 30 Wilbert Robinson $800---SGC 10 Tommy McCarthy $600----SGC Authentic Hugh Duffy $550---Scans available--Also commons for sale--Thanks, Don
